ratings.comment: Ryan was great! I learned a lot, and have great respect for him.

Professor Zea must have spent time representing our country, Soldier? Solid leader, sets the example of how to be an important part of the human race. Can't wait to see what else he will teach. Inspirational in his methods and concepts. Conveys his messages in a clear, concise method with a great sense of humor. His follow up is also excellent.
Literally my dad. Love Ryan. Has the best socks. Is super good at things. Has the cutest bald head.

Literally the dorkiest, dad-like professor I've had so far at UW. But his passion for stats left me impressed with him as an individual and as a professor. He made great efforts to explain the concepts and all assignments/tests to the students. Nothing felt unfair, he never tried to trick up people on tests.

Ryan was a great instructor. The class was blended which worked really nice due to the weekly homework assignments. Ryan is clearly really passionate about teaching statistics, and has super funny "dad humor". Overall loved the class, and would take classes by him in the future.

Ryan Zea is super cool! He's funny and actually makes lectures interesting.  Homework and an online quiz is assigned just about every week but it's very manageable and easy points.  There is also a short writing assignment that's pretty easy.  Would definitely take it again! Overall, he makes his class very reasonable and makes stats interesting.

Professor Zea is so great! He is really excited about his subject, and he is passionate about teaching it. It makes class that much easier to go to. Exams are fair, lectures are entertaining, and he is super approachable. I wish I could have him as a professor again.

I'm definitely no math major--I only took this to fill a requirement--but honestly I'd say this class is one of the best I've taken so far at this university.  He's hilarious in lectures, which themselves I found were easy to follow and very true to the exam material.  10/10 would recommend this class.
Honestly loves what he is teaching, and he is hilarious. This  is the only class I am ever interested in attending, his examples are fun, and his teaching methods are great. Not a bad class.
exam is  very hard and the curve is very high
Has the best sense of humor.  Goes up and beyond to provide examples to students. Has a passion for teaching that is contagious. Really enjoyed this class. Would take class again.
